xwikidoc.name: WebHome
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.admin
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.admin
xwikidoc.content:
{{velocity}} #set($docextras=[]) The bibliography application allows to manager biliographic data on XWiki.
The current available actions are :
#if( $services.security.authorization.hasAccess('view', 'Bibliography.Data.Entries.WebHome')) * [[Search for an entry>>doc:Bibliography.Data.Entries.WebHome]] #end #if( $services.security.authorization.hasAccess('view', 'Bibliography.Data.Persons.WebHome')) * [[Search for a person>>doc:Bibliography.Data.Persons.WebHome]] #end
#if( $services.security.authorization.hasAccess('view', 'Bibliography.Code.ImportBibTeX')) * [[Import from BibTex/BibLaTeX>>doc:Bibliography.Code.ImportBibTeX]] #end
#if( $services.security.authorization.hasAccess('view', 'Bibliography.Code.CreatePerson')) * [[Create a person>>doc:Bibliography.Code.CreatePerson]] #end #if( $services.security.authorization.hasAccess('view', 'Bibliography.Code.MergePersons')) * [[Merge two persons>>doc:Bibliography.Code.MergePersons]] #end
#if( $services.security.authorization.hasAccess('view', 'Bibliography.Code.CreateEntry')) * [[Create an entry>>doc:Bibliography.Code.CreateEntry]] #end
#if( $services.security.authorization.hasAccess('view', 'Bibliography.Configuration.Configuration')) * [[View configuration>>doc:Bibliography.Configuration.Configuration]] #end
#if( $services.security.authorization.hasAccess('view', 'Bibliography.Code.EntryTypes')) * [[View entry types>>doc:Bibliography.Code.EntryTypes]] #end
#if( $services.security.authorization.hasAccess('view', 'Bibliography.Code.ListIndexedSpaces')) * [[List the indexed spaces>>doc:Bibliography.Code.ListIndexedSpaces]] #end
{{/velocity}}
